title: GLOBALink | HK business magnate says improving electoral system crucial for HK's future
content:
HONG KONG, March 18 (Xinhua) -- Central authorities held over 60 symposiums, made visits and arranged interviews in Hong Kong from Monday to Wednesday to solicit opinion from a wide range of sectors about implementing the decision of the National People's Congress (NPC) on improving the electoral system of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR).
Allan Zeman, Chairman of Lan Kwai Fong Group, said "patriots governing Hong Kong" is crucial for Hong Kong's future when sharing his insights with press.
Produced by Xinhua Global Service
